alert.note: Alert for East Marshall; Kittson; Pennington; Roseau; West Marshall; West Polk (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 7:59PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Marshall, north central Polk, Kittson, Roseau and northwestern Pennington Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 759 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Robbin to Argyle to near Key West. Movement was northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Kennedy, Old Mill State Park and Donaldson around 805 PM CDT. Florian, Englund and Hallock around 810 PM CDT. Strandquist around 815 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Carpenters Corner, Karlstad, Lake Bronson, Viking and Rosewood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Marshall; Kittson; Pennington; Roseau; West Marshall; West Polk
